description: With nine playable characters, multiple gameplay modes and link cable support for two players,Tekken Advanceis definitely a game worth fighting for! You'll find all your favorite fighters including Jin Kazama, Paul Phoenix, Forest Law and Gun Jack, as well as Hwoarang, King, Ling Xiaoyu, Nina Williams, and Yoshimitsu. It's time to kick, punch and pummel those polygons, available only for the Game Boy Advance.
